Articles.Content: Starting a new career and I want to avoid Kerbal losses at all costs.  Is there a way to launch unmanned rockets with pods on top and still able able to control the flight?

Yes!  just include a guidance/control part of some kind, they are in the same place as the crewed pods. Nothing saying you can’t use both XD

Edited July 24, 2019 by Guest
To do so, you need to unlock some reasonably high tech nodes on the Electronics branch of the tech tree. To start with, you need the OKTO and/or HECS probe cores.
